title: Issue 361
summary: Never been a better time to learn DotNet MAUI

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #361 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of this week's Xamarin and DotNet MAUI community news and articles.

This week there are loads of introductory articles and videos for those getting started with MAUI, so if you haven't already dived in, it's probably a good time to dip your toes.

Have a fantastic week,

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #361 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of this week's Xamarin and DotNet MAUI community news and articles.

This week there are loads of introductory articles and videos for those getting started with MAUI, so if you haven't already dived in, it's probably a good time to dip your toes.

Have a fantastic week,

Kym

items.title: Learn Live - Create a cross-platform app with .NET MAUI
items.description:
Join James Montemagno and Matt Soucoup for this Learn Live session where you will learn how to use Visual Studio with .NET MAUI to create a cross-platform app.

items.title: Visual Studio Live! - Native Cross-Platform Mobile & Desktop Apps with .NET MAUI
items.description:
Join James Montemagno to get a first look of .NET MAUI in .NET 6 and learn how you can start using it today to build native apps with C# for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows. James will break down every part of .NET MAUI that you need to know about and how you can leverage your existing C# and .NET skills, libraries, and tools to build awesome apps.

Visual Studio Live! - Native Cross-Platform Mobile & Desktop Apps with .NET MAUI by Microsoft Developer
items.description_markdown:
Join James Montemagno to get a first look of .NET MAUI in .NET 6 and learn how you can start using it today to build native apps with C# for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows. James will break down every part of .NET MAUI that you need to know about and how you can leverage your existing C# and .NET skills, libraries, and tools to build awesome apps.

[**Visual Studio Live! - Native Cross-Platform Mobile & Desktop Apps with .NET MAUI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X0M9t8o_ezQ) by [Microsoft Developer]()

embedded_links.title: **Visual Studio Live! - Native Cross-Platform Mobile & Desktop Apps with .NET MAUI**

[**.NET MAUI & Blazor - Sharing code between app and web**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_C8X-b2qXE) by [Daniel Hindrikes](https://twitter.com/hindrikes)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI & Blazor - Sharing code between app and web**

items.title: Play Sound in .NET MAUI with Plugin.Maui.Audio
items.description:
If you need to play a small sound effect or just a song this plugin is for you! With Plugin.Maui.Audio it's very easy to just add one or multiple sounds to your application. Ideal for your audio feedback whenever the user taps on something or maybe you're building a game PEW PEW!

Play Sound in .NET MAUI with Plugin.Maui.Audio by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
If you need to play a small sound effect or just a song this plugin is for you! With Plugin.Maui.Audio it's very easy to just add one or multiple sounds to your application. Ideal for your audio feedback whenever the user taps on something or maybe you're building a game PEW PEW!

[**Play Sound in .NET MAUI with Plugin.Maui.Audio**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oIYnEuZ9oew) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: .NET MAUI Maps: A First Look - Pins, Polygons and more!
items.description:
It's finally here! .NET MAUI Maps is making its way into the .NET MAUI codebase so let's have a first look at what it can do. Can you keep a secret? I will also tell you how to get hold of the first bits to try .NET MAUI Maps out yourself... Today!

.NET MAUI Maps: A First Look - Pins, Polygons and more! by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
It's finally here! .NET MAUI Maps is making its way into the .NET MAUI codebase so let's have a first look at what it can do. Can you keep a secret? I will also tell you how to get hold of the first bits to try .NET MAUI Maps out yourself... Today!

[**.NET MAUI Maps: A First Look - Pins, Polygons and more!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pjPou4xKrQo) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI Maps: A First Look - Pins, Polygons and more!**

items.title: .NET MAUI Tutorial for Beginners
items.description:
Let's start our journey together to build beautiful native multi-platform apps with .NET MAUI, C#, .NET, and Visual Studio! In this video I am going to guide you through the entire process and describe everything that is in File - New Project for .NET MAUI to build apps for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows. We will explore what .NET MAUI is, how it works, what you need to get started, how to deploy and debug, navigate, style your app, and so much more.

.NET MAUI Tutorial for Beginners by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Let's start our journey together to build beautiful native multi-platform apps with .NET MAUI, C#, .NET, and Visual Studio! In this video I am going to guide you through the entire process and describe everything that is in File - New Project for .NET MAUI to build apps for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows. We will explore what .NET MAUI is, how it works, what you need to get started, how to deploy and debug, navigate, style your app, and so much more.

[**.NET MAUI Tutorial for Beginners**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rumfIg9qJ_Y) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

items.title: Let's Build a Conference App with .NET MAUI Live!
items.description:
James Montemagno loves building conference apps! He built the Evolve 2014 and Evolve 2016 apps with Xamarin.Forms, but .NET MAUI is here and let's see how fast we can build out a full conference application with agenda, speakers, favorites, sponsors, and more!

Let's Build a Conference App with .NET MAUI Live! by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
James Montemagno loves building conference apps! He built the Evolve 2014 and Evolve 2016 apps with Xamarin.Forms, but .NET MAUI is here and let's see how fast we can build out a full conference application with agenda, speakers, favorites, sponsors, and more!


[**Let's Build a Conference App with .NET MAUI Live!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SAcv4nGDU_I) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **Let's Build a Conference App with .NET MAUI Live!**
